column5: I was out today taking the dog for a walk and swim in a local forest and river when I saw 2 rainbows in full spawning fight .The bed is in the bottom left corner of the pictures and the female was actually silver . I couldn't believe they would still be spawning in these temperatures but they were , strange spring indeed ! I won't give exact location but will say they were in a small trib. of the Notty and a looong way from the bay . Here are a couple pictures .
Got a few spewing eggs last weekend. But I've also got them in early July doing the same. Water temps dictate when they are ready and I fish perhaps the coldest system on all of the great lakes.
Nice pics.. Sad thing is some guys would actually try and catch those things, lol!
A lot of the Notty tribs are high and still cold. I,m not surprised they are still up far. Been a crazy spring.
